channel.title: 1 Hit KO
channel.description: is there a code to make only the owner on a RSPS have a i hit KO? if so wat is it?

item.title: 1 Hit KO
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“kicker862, post:9, topic:349822”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=446196.msg3279651#msg3279651 date=1279779778]

So if you can’t figure it out why do you bother?
[/quote]So if you can’t help, why post?

if it works for me why should it not work for someone else.
so obviously i can help.
just bcause someone is dumb doesnt mean my posts are wrong.[/quote]

true dat, going why change all to 99999 why not just change them to 1000, that is still extremely over powered.

item.title: 1 Hit KO
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

[quote=“kicker862, post:3, topic:349822”][code] }

    if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Brandon")) // unequips weapon if your name isn't Brandon.
    {
        remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
        sendMessage("You can't wield such power");
        PoisonPlayer();
    }[/code]

this is for my 1 hit KO scythe.
no one but me can wear it or itll take it off.
so pretend you set it to be a bronze dagger.
you just change 1419 to 5688
and change brandon to your username

but you also have to change the weapon stats.[/quote]

will work but theres a glitch if they have the scythe in the inv and they’re weilding a weapon
thier inv is full they equip the scythe the scythe gets equipped and it doesnt come off unless theres a free inv space

i would suggest

    if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) // unequips weapon if your name isn't Matching
    {
                    deleteequiment(1419, 3);
        sendMessage("your not the owner noob.");
    }

this deletes the equipment if its worn

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Hit KO
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

Just go into item.cfg
Search for perfect ring, (search for perfect till you find it)
Change all the stats to 999999
There is your 1 hit k0 item, Fails tbh.

Read full topic

[code] }

    if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Brandon")) // unequips weapon if your name isn't Brandon.
    {
        remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
        sendMessage("You can't wield such power");
        PoisonPlayer();
    }[/code]

this is for my 1 hit KO scythe.
no one but me can wear it or itll take it off.
so pretend you set it to be a bronze dagger.
you just change 1419 to 5688
and change brandon to your username

but you also have to change the weapon stats.
